allow: Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:8080/students/login/ > nul 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done')

Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'python manage.py runserver 8080 > nul 2>&1 & sleep 2 && curl -s http://localhost:8080/students/login/ -o nul && echo ""Server started successfully"" || echo ""Server failed to start""')
